page.title: 01THE SAMPFORDS
page.content:
This area is a very rural area. There are about nineteen farms and they are nearly all arable farms.There are several moats,two springs and one well in the rectangle two.The River Pant runs through this area. There are only two main roads running through here .There is an old airfield. The main roads both come from Wimbish.One of the roads goes through Great Sampford and the other one goes back to Wimbish. There are remains of a Roman Road in the neighbourhood.There is a large Manor House called Tindon End Manor to the south of the rectangle. Several children who go to our school live in this rectangle.The children who live in the west of the rectangle go to Wimbish School or to Thaxted School.
